text: Je loka ha phara motha aksepa racuna ale aheta. Ha dekhila tumacyatala eka samuha ahe. Tumhi tyala apalyakarita va'ita samaju naka kimbahuna ha tumacyasathi cangala ahe. Matra tyancyapaiki pratyekavara tevadha aparadha ahe, jevadha tyane kamavila ahe ani tyancyapaiki jyane tyata mothya pramanata bhaga ghetala ahe, tyaci siksahi phara mothi ahe
